title: Client Keeps Closing itself in Champ Select
body:
Hello all,

Sometimes during champ select I see a 'white hourglass' appear and 10 seconds latter the client kicks me out. This is really annoying as I keep losing proms due to this glitch. Yes, I have tried repairing but the bug keeps coming back.

replies.body: Updated Graphics Drivers so that may have fixed the bug.
Well it happened again. I can't even pass a ranked promo because of it...

Hello, 

Sorry for the late replay. No error message of any kind. Just the hourglass shows up and it randomly crashes. It has not happened in a few days tho...

Hey

When you say the client kicks you out - do you mean it crashes?  Does it show an error or message of any kind?

Cheers
Mindstar
